test_summary: All 5 tests passed - 3 new Windows compatibility tests and 2 existing permission tests
summary: Added Windows compatibility for os.fchmod by wrapping it in try/except to handle AttributeError on Windows where the function doesn't exist.
risks: On Windows, temp files don't get 0o600 permissions set via fchmod, but still rely on unpredictable tempfile names and directory permissions for security
limitations: On Windows, chmod functionality is skipped gracefully - temp files rely on filesystem defaults rather than explicit 0o600 permissions
